/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, providing a serene backdrop to the busy street below.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered across the street, indicating a busy time of day.

Power lines crisscross above, forming a complex web that powers the city. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, ready to bathe the street in light as dusk falls. The image is a snapshot of life in Beijing, capturing the blend of nature, architecture, and urban life that characterizes the city.
